page.title: 16Farming ( College )
page.content: There are two farms in Hadlow College they are called Bourne Grange Farm and Faulkners Farm. Bourne Grange Farm is a small farm but it has a lot of different crops.This is so the students at Hadlow College can study about the crops and then grow some themselves. Some of the crops are hops,maize,potatoes,turnips and swedes. Faulkners Farm is a bigger farm but it has fewer crops.The students use this farm as well.A large part of it is a dairy farm.Some of the crops and products in this farm are milk,barley, spring barley,wheat and potatoes.
